description: This file defines a React functional component 'StationList' that displays a paginated list of gas stations, including details like name, address, rating, distance, and allows selecting a station to focus on a map. It includes internal state for pagination and utilizes external utility functions.

methods.name: StationList({ stations = [], onSelect, selectedId, loading = false, error = '' })
methods.description: React component that renders a list of gas stations with pagination, selection, and error/loading states.

ctags.pattern: /^function StationList({ stations = [], onSelect, selectedId, loading = false, error = '' }) {$/
